name: Timelight
description:
A GMTK Game Jam 2021 game by Waikiki Games.

Past and Present, Joined together.

Peek through the time with your Timelight, and Escape the Mysterious Hotel.

You can see the past through your flashlight.

Controls

WASD - Move

E - Interact

Left Click - Turn on the Timelight

Right Click - Fix the Timelight Position

CreditsMade By

Andy Ahn - Game Designer @ AlohaFactory
